name: Monster Clean Up
description:
Play as Bennie, a janitor tasked with cleaning up the warehouse after a recent monster infestation. Defeat as many monsters as possible by using your trusty cleaning supplies! There are six different power-ups to discover :)

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move
  • Left mouse button (click or hold) to shoot
  • ESC to pause

Credits:

  • wombok - code and art (@wombokgames)
  • Edwin Jones - music and sound FX (@edwinjonesrebelcomposer)

Note: the web build may not load in older versions of Safari.
